power.title: Bash and Pinion
power.fluff: You slam your weapon through your foe's defenses, creating an opening and stepping in to trap your enemy

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must have a hand free

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] damage, and you slide the target 1 square to a square adjacent to you.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You grab the target until the end of your next turn.
Until the grab ends, the target takes a penalty to all attack rolls equal to one-half your Dexterity modifier.

power.title: Bell Ringer
power.fluff: You smash your weapon into your enemy, jarring its vitals

section.name: Prerequisite:
section.text: You must have training in Endurance.

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: Strength modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus + number of healing surges you have expended damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Hammer or Mace:
section.text: Additional damage equal to your Constitution modifier.
You gain temporary hit points equal to your Constitution modifier.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage, and the target cannot take triggered actions until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Covering Attack
power.fluff: You launch a ferocious attack at your enemy, allowing one of your allies to safely retreat from it

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and an ally adjacent to the target can shift 2 squares as a free reaction

section.name: Miss:
section.text: An ally adjacent to the target can shift 1 square as a free reaction.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, if the target makes an attack against the ally you allowed to shift, your enforce challenge gains the following benefits:
► You can trigger enforce challenge even if the target's attack includes you.
► If the target's attack does not include you, you gain a +2 bonus to the attack roll and deal half damage even on a miss.

power.title: Distracting Spate
power.fluff: Your flurry of feints and strikes leaves your foe's defenses unstead

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.

section.name: Two Melee Weapons:
section.text: Additional damage equal to your Dexterity modifier.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target grants combat advantage to you until the end of your next turn.
If your attack hit, you can choose for the target to instead grant combat advantage to an ally of your choice.

power.title: Funneling Flurry
power.fluff: With snake-like strikes, you force two of your enemies to move where you want them

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be wielding two melee weapons

section.name: Primary Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC (main weapon>

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] (main) + Strength modifier damage, and you slide the target 1 square.

section.name: Secondary Attack:
section.target: one creature other than the primary target
section.text: Strength vs. AC (off-hand weapon)

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] (off-hand) + Strength modifier damage, and you slide the target 1 square.

power.title: Goading Maneuver
power.fluff: After a swift strike, you step to the side and draw more foes into your trap

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you shift 2 squares.

section.name: Pick:
section.text: You can slide the target 2 squares to a space adjacent to you after you have shifted.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: You shift 1 square.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You can mark any enemies adjacent to you until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Hack and Hew
power.fluff: You hack an enemy with one stroke and then slash at another with your next swing

section.name: Primary Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage

section.name: Axe, Pick:
section.text: Additional damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

section.name: Secondary Attack:
section.target: one creature other than the primary target
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage.

section.name: Heavy Blade:
section.text: Additional damage equal to your Dexterity modifier.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: If at least one attack hit, you gain temporary hit points equal to your Constitution modifier.
If both attacks hit, you increase the number of temporary hit points you gain by the number of healing surges you have expended (minimum 2).

power.title: Lunging Strike
power.fluff: You lunge at a foe that thought it was beyond your reach

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.

section.name: Polearm, Staff:
section.text: Additional damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.

section.name: Spear:
section.text: Additional damage equal to your Dexterity modifier.

power.title: Passing Attack
power.fluff: You strike at one foe, allowing your momentum to carry you forward into a second strike at another enemy

section.name: Primary Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you can shift up to 2 squares.

section.name: Light Blade:
section.text: Increase the number of squares you can shift by your Dexterity modifier.

section.name: Staff:
section.text: Increase the number of squares you can shift by your Wisdom modifier.
Make the secondary attack.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: You can shift up to half the distance.

section.name: Secondary Attack:
section.target: one creature other than the primary target
section.text: Strength +4 vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage.

power.title: Power Strike
power.fluff: By pushing yourself beyond your limits, you unleash your full wrath against a foe

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You hit an enemy with a melee basic attack or a Fighter at-will attack

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The triggering attack deals +1[W] damage.

power.title: Punishing Charge
power.fluff: As you charge into battle, your weapon opens a path to your chosen foe

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be wielding a two-handed melee weapon.
You gain the following benefits for the charge:
► Any enemy that attacks you with a melee attack triggered by your charge takes damage equal to your Constitution modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus.
► If a triggered attack places a condition on you that would prevent you from completing this attack, you can make a saving throw to ignore that condition until this attack is completed.

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Strength modifier + Constitution modifier damage

power.title: Serpent's Coil
power.fluff: Like a striking snake, your weapon flashes and catches the limbs of your foe

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] damage, and until the end of your next turn, the target takes a penalty to attack rolls equal to your Dexterity modifier.

section.name: Flail:
section.text: You grab the target without needing a free hand. The grab ends automatically at the end of your next turn.

section.name: Light Blade:
section.text: Additional damage equal to your Dexterity modifier.

power.title: Shield Bash
power.fluff: You knock your adversary off balance with your shield and follow up with a takedown

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be using a shield

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength +2 vs. Fortitude

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: Strength +4

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d10 + Strength modifier + Wisdom modifier damage, and you push the target 1 square and knock it prone.

section.name: Critical:
section.text: +1d10 additional damage.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: +2d10 additional damage.

section.name: Special:
section.text: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.
If you are a dwarf, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack when making an opportunity attack.

power.title: Shield Riposte
power.fluff: Sweeping an attack aside, you strike with your shield while your foe is out of position

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be using a shield

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An enemy adjacent to you hits or misses you or an ally with a melee attack

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You push the triggering enemy 1 square and shift 2 squares to a space adjacent to the it.

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength +3 vs. Reflex

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: Strength +6

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d10 + Strength modifier damage.

section.name: Critical:
section.text: +1d10 additional damage.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: +2d10 additional damage.

power.fluff: You spin beneath your enemy's guard with a slashing strike and then sweep your leg, knocking them to the ground

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You knock the target prone.

power.title: Steel Serpent Strike
power.fluff: You lash out with the speed of a striking serpent, hitting your foe in a vulnerable area that hinders their movement

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is slowed and cannot shift until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Target cannot shift until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Surprising Stab
power.fluff: You slash at your enemy's head and bring in your off-hand weapon with a fast, deadly strike

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be wielding two melee weapons

section.name: Primary Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. Reflex (main weapon)

section.name: Hit:
section.text: Strength modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus damage, and the target grants you combat advantage until the end of this turn. Make the secondary attack.

section.name: Secondary Target:
section.text: The primary target

section.name: Secondary Attack:
section.text: Strength +2 vs. AC (off-hand weapon)

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] (off-hand) + Strength modifier damage.

power.title: Takedown Attack
power.fluff: You bash your foe with a vicious attack and then drag the creature down to the ground

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must have a hand free

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Primary Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you knock the target prone. The target cannot stand up until the end of your next turn or until you are no longer adjacent to it, whichever comes first.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: You knock the target prone.

section.name: Special:
section.text: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.
